Steps.Message: Update at 08:21 - Our engineers have located the fault and will now start digging down to the cable and make repairs. At the moment, we don't need to change the timeframe, although the power may come back on in stages as our engineers progress with the repair. We'll keep you updated with any further news from site.

We became aware of a power cut at 01:59. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 08:21 - Our engineers have located the fault and will now start digging down to the cable and make repairs. At the moment, we don't need to change the timeframe, although the power may come back on in stages as our engineers progress with the repair. We'll keep you updated with any further news from site.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
